Question
========
  
A researcher discovers that extroverts can solve a problem better than introverts in a large room, but introverts can solve a problem better than extroverts in a small room. Which of the following answers is TRUE?

Answerlist
----------
* This rash describes a person through his/her interaction with the environment (PxE).
* This outcome describes room size as the main effect.
* This outcome describes personality as the main effect.
* In this study, there are two main effects (room size and personalities), but there is no interaction.
